item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello There. I have been thinking in sharing my thoughts. I do not consider myself a good writer nor a good software engineer, but I like to sit in silence and think about what I do. I hope you enjoy it.

item.title: Teamwork - Collaboration
item.description: Many times as a Software Engineer you might realize you have grown your toolset of skills and feel you deserve a promotion. However, during the promotion cycle, your manager gave you feedback that for you to get promoted you need to grow others around you. This statement might have puzzled you, since when has your performance as an individual contributor had anything to do with other people? It is called the Individual Contributor path for a reason, no?
